channel.title: BL-84 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in BL-84 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 211). Use US-30 west for Heyburn and Burley; I-84/US-30 East for Pocatello and Ogden (Utah); I-84 West for Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 112 at ID-78
item.description: I-84 East Exit 112 at ID-78. Turn right on ID-78/To (Old) US-30 for Hammett. Turn left for Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114 - Cold Springs Road

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114 - Cold Springs Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114 - Cold Springs Road.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: I-84 west on Exit 211 offramp. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; turn left for BL-84 West/US-30 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boise. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137 - BL-84/US-30/Bliss/Buhl. US-30 leaves I-84 here, and rejoins I-84 in Heyburn. This is the western end of the Thousands Springs Scenic Byway.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boies. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop. This interchange was recently rebuilt as part of the widening of I-84 between Nampa and Boise.

item.title: US-20 West at I-84
item.description: US-20 west at I-84/US-26/US-30. BL-84 begins here and heads into Mountain Home.

item.title: US-91 North at US-89/UT-13/BL-15/BL-84
item.description: US-91 north at US-89/UT-13/BL-15/BL-84. US-89 joins US-91 north to Logan.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137 - BL-84/US-30/Bliss/Buhl. US-30 leaves I-84 here, and rejoins I-84 in Heyburn.

item.title: ID-55 North at BL-84
item.description: ID-55 north at BL-84 (Nampa-Caldwell Blvd.). Continue north on ID-55 for I-84.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR).

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR). This is a new sign as part of the I-84 widening between Meridian and Nampa.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd./Murphy

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd./Nampa

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 95
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 95 - BL-84/US-20/To ID-51/To ID-67/Mountain Home/Fairfield.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 95
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 95 - BL-84/US-20/Mountain Home/Fairfield.

item.title: US-30 West At I-84 West Exit 137
item.description: US-30 West at I-84 west Exit 137 onramp.

item.title: US-30 West at BL-84
item.description: US-30 west at BL-84. Turn left for US-30 to Boise and Bliss. Turn right for US-26 and I-84 to Gooding.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching BL-84
item.description: US-30 west approaching BL-84/To US-26/To I-84 in Bliss.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 99
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 99, BL-84/To ID-51/To ID-67/Mountain Home/Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114, BL-84/To ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114, BL-84/ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 137
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 137, Bliss/Pioneer Road.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 141, BL-84/US-26/To US-30/Bliss/Hagerman.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 141, BL-84/US-26/To US-30/Bliss/Hagerman, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141 - Hagerman Fossil Beds NM
item.description: For Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument, use Exit 141 on I-84 west.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 40
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 40, UT-102/Tremonton.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 40
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 40, UT-102/BL-84/Tremonton, 1 mile.

item.title: BL-84 - Glenns Ferry
item.description: Bannock St. north at Oregon Trail. Continue north on Bannock St. for BL-84 west (to I-84 west). Turn right on Oregon Trail for I-84 east (via BL-84 east).

item.title: BL-84 East at ID-78
item.description: BL-84 east at ID-78 south to Bruneau, and Bruneau Dunes State Park. ID-78 follows the south side of the Snake River to Marsing.

item.title: End Hammet Business Loop
item.description: End BL-84 at I-84 in Hammett.

item.title: I-84 East at BL-84/To ID-78 East
item.description: I-84 East Exit 112 offramp at BL-84. Turn right on BL-84/To ID-78 for Hammett and Bruneau Dunes State Park. Turn left for Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: I-84 West at BL-84/To ID-78
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114 offramp. Turn left for BL-84 West/To ID-78 to Hammett. Turn right for Cold Springs Road.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 27 Offramp - Use Left Lane for ID-19
item.description: I-84 west Exit 27 offramp at ID-19. Use left lane for ID-19 west.

item.title: ID-19 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-19 west/BL-84 east to Nampa, Wilder, and Homedale.

item.title: ID-19 West at I-84 Onramp
item.description: BL-84/ID-19 west at I-84 (Exit 27) onramp to Boise. Continue west on BL-84/ID-19 to Homedale and Wilder.

item.title: ID-19 West/BL-84 East - Caldwell
item.description: ID-19 West/BL-84 East in just west of I-84.

item.title: ID-19 West/BL-84 East Split
item.description: ID-19 west/BL-84 east at ID-19/BL-84 split. ID-19 west goes to Greenleaf, Wilder, and Homedale. BL-84 east goes to Nampa.

item.title: ID-19 West/ID-84 East Split
item.description: ID-19 west/BL-84 east at ID-19/BL-84 split.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 141, US-26/US-30 junction

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 211, US-30/ID-24 to Heyburn and Burley

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: US-30/ID-24/BL-84 at I-84 interchange

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84 and US-30
item.description: I-84 west onramp at the eastern terminus of ID-24

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30 Jct.
item.description: End of ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction

item.title: I-84 East Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137, BL-84/US-30. US-30 is the 1000 Springs Scenic Byway

item.description: I-84 at Exit 208, BL-84/ID-27

item.title: ID-27 North at US-30
item.description: ID-27 north at US-30/BL-84 junction to Hansen,Paul, and Heyburn

item.title: ID-27 North at US-30
item.description: US-30 junction on ID-27 north

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114 - BL-84/To ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114 - BL-84/ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett at the eastern end of the Hammett business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121 - BL-84/Glenns Ferry at the eastern end of the Glenns Ferry business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 121 - BL-84/Glenns Ferry at the eastern end of the Glenns Ferry business loop.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 99 Offramp
item.description: BL-84/To ID-51/To ID-67 to Mountain Home at I-84 Junction

item.title: US-30 West/BL-84 - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30/BL-84 West - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway in Bliss.

item.title: US-30/BL-84 West - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: Thousand Springs Scenic Byway and BL-84/US-30 Shields in Bliss

item.title: BL-84/US-30 East at US-30 East
item.description: BL-84/US-30 east at US-30 east to Hagerman and Buhl. BL-84 meets I-84 and US-26 about 1/4 mile to the east.

item.title: US-30 East - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30/BL-84 East - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
